about_the_game:
Gothic Clicker is an ARPG clicker with great possibilities to customise your character and his combat style.

You have been pulled from the clutches of death by the necromancer Zotania to help her collect the bones of chaos and rid the kingdom of Elderath from red fog.

Character

An unconventional approach to character development offers 5 combat and 5 crafting branches, in each of which a flexible perk system awaits you.

Whether it's cold weapons or sorcery, hunting or herbalism, or maybe all of them at once - it's up to you!

Inventory and Crafting

Upgrade weapons with minerals, brew potions, wear rings, armour and amulets. You can wear 10 rings at a time, and you can combine them to become Rings of Power.

Rebirth and Astral

Your soul is in a state of the astral. You are not alive, but you are not dead either.

As you are reborn, strengthen your soul and become stronger. The secret sigils of Alchemists and Awakened Ones can help turn the tide of the party, and going into the Astral will open access to the powerful threads of the soul, revealing the vast cosmic intent.

Guilds

The ancient kingdom of Elderath is home to a thriving array of fighting and crafting guilds. Proving your worth to a guild will get you equipped with the finest armour, and guild masters will train you in new perks.

Weapons

Thanks to the power of the Philosopher's Stone and gold, weapons, magic runes, etc. can be upgraded directly during combat.

Each weapon has its own set of techniques, which can also be pumped and combined at will.

Soundtrack

Melancholy shamanic music composed by Stanislav Belyaev emphasises the decadence and depth of Gothic Clicker's bleak world.

short_description: Gothic Clicker is a ARPG clicker with an emphasis on combat. Hunt and mine for ore, draw your sword and pray to the gods! Develop combat skills and crafts, upgrade weapons and gain gold. Perform harsh rites of rebirth to become stronger and fight ancient evil.
